sentences.en: A non - refundable deposit of HKD 1000 is payable upon booking confirmation.
sentences.cn: 订位一经确认须缴付订金每位港币1000(订金不可退还).

sentences.en: A non refundable deposit of HK $ 3, 000 is required upon reservation.
sentences.cn: 订位时须缴付订金港币3, 000元,已付之费用概不退还.

sentences.en: A refundable deposit is payable on arrival.
sentences.cn: 可退还订金到店即可退还。

sentences.en: All deposits for holiday cottages are refundable.
sentences.cn: 度假别墅的抵押金可全数退还.

sentences.en: All parties will begin at the scheduled time. All deposits are non - refundable.
sentences.cn: 所有派对需依时举行,迟到者自误及所有订金均不获发还.

sentences.en: All redeemed products are not refundable or returnable, expect quality issue.
sentences.cn: 除产品之质素问题外,所有己领取之产品将不获退换.

sentences.en: All the items sold out are not refundable and exchangeable.
sentences.cn: 所有寄出的产品,我们将不接受任何的退换.

sentences.en: Fees paid are not refundable, except under exceptional circumstances.
sentences.cn: 除特殊情况外,一切已缴费用,概不退还.

sentences.en: If I could not make it, is the fee paid refundable?
sentences.cn: 如果我不能去的话, 能不能退费?

sentences.en: Orders cannot be cancelled or changed once received, deposit are non - refundable.
sentences.cn: 订购一经接纳,恕不可取消或更改,而所收取之款项将不获退还.

sentences.en: Package is non - refundable , non - reroutable and Valid on flight date shown.
sentences.cn: 机票及旅游代用券一经发出, 不可更改日期及航班,不可退票.

sentences.en: This membership fee lasts for 12 months and is non - refundable.
sentences.cn: 这会员费有效期12个月中途不退款.

sentences.en: Tickets can only be used on the date and are non - refundable.
sentences.cn: 入场票只于指定日期使用,所有已缴交之费用恕不退还.

phrases.tran_cn: 存出保证金；可退还的定金

trans.tran_en: A refundable payment will be paid back to you in certain circumstances
